identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

typography.instructions: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css. Use Manrope for all headings (h1-h3) and IBM Plex Sans for body text, inputs, and tables.

usage_rules: Use HSL values in index.css variables.
Primary color (Indigo) is for main actions and active states.
Borders should be subtle (Slate-200 in light, Slate-800 in dark).

structure.sidebar: Fixed width (w-64) or collapsible. Dark mode sidebar preferred even in light theme for contrast.

cards.header: p-6 flex flex-row items-center justify-between space-y-0 pb-2

inputs.style: rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

tables.header: h-10 px-2 text-left align-middle font-medium text-muted-foreground [&:has([role=checkbox])]:pr-0

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-md bg-background/80 border-b border-border/40 sticky top-0 z-20
visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle gradients for active states or chart fills, NOT for backgrounds.
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-md for dropdowns/popovers.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid border-color. Use 'Grid Borders' style for dashboard metrics.

images.description: Grayscale industrial machine, suitable for login page background with overlay.
Professional portrait for user profile or top performer.
Abstract tech logo for the dashboard branding.

assets.icons: Use lucide-react for all UI icons. Use @phosphor-icons/react for marketing or feature highlights if needed.

charts_and_maps.library: Recharts for charts, React Simple Maps for India map.
charts_and_maps.style: Minimalist, no grid lines (or very subtle), customized tooltips.
charts_and_maps.colors: Use the chart colors defined in the palette. Ensure high contrast against background.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text meets WCAG AA (4.5:1). Use APCA for fine-tuning.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements.

universal_guidelines: Do not use 'Inter' font for headings.
Do not center-align the main app container.
Create components in 'src/components/ui' if they don't exist, following Shadcn patterns.
Use 'export const' for components and 'export default' for pages.
instructions_to_main_agent: Read this file first. Update 'tailwind.config.js' and 'index.css' with the provided values. Install necessary fonts. Build the layout using the 'Control Room' grid strategy. Use the provided image URLs for placeholders.
